ygData.subject: Robe of the Lost Circle
ygData.msgSnippet: I have completed the quest yesterday, with a tailoring skill of 36, and I got the trivial message. BUT I know a monk who failed with the exact same skill, and
ygData.messageBody:
I have completed the quest yesterday, with a tailoring skill of 36, and I
got the trivial message. BUT I know a monk who failed with the exact same
skill, and lost all the items. I I heard about some fellow monks who
succeeded with a skill in the low 20s, and got the trivial message too. So,
my guess is that the robe is always trivial, but if you have a VERY bad
luck, you can fail. That is a risk you must be aware of.
Next step, the Treant Fists !!

Tsin Suchiko
38th rank, Tunare.
